bug.author: Shreeshrii
bug.summary: Some LSTM unittests failing with latest changes
bug.description:
<denchmark-code>============================================================== tesseract 5.0.0-alpha-833-ga06c: unittest/test-suite.log ==============================================================
# TOTAL: 54 # PASS: 51 # SKIP: 0 # XFAIL: 0 # FAIL: 3 # XPASS: 0 # ERROR: 0

<denchmark-code>PASS: lstm_recode_test ../../../config/test-driver: line 107: 27507 Segmentation fault "$@" > $log_file 2>&1 FAIL: lstm_squashed_test ../../../config/test-driver: line 107: 27518 Segmentation fault "$@" > $log_file 2>&1 FAIL: lstm_test ../../../config/test-driver: line 107: 27563 Aborted "$@" > $log_file 2>&1 FAIL: lstmtrainer_test PASS: loadlang_test </denchmark-code>

comments.comment: The bug was caused by a wrong serialization in one of my latest commits. I fixed that now in Git master.
